Services

Allergy

Allergy Services are provided in our Specialists Department, by Paul Shapero, MD. Dr. Shapero specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of asthma and other allergy-related diseases and is trained to identify the factors that trigger asthma or allergy symptoms. Services and treatment include: Allergy testing Prevention education Medication prescriptions Immunotherapy (Allergy Shots) Consult your primary… Read more »

Audiology

Voted Bangor’s Best Hearing Aid Center for 6 years in a row! Audiological Hearing Evaluation The Warren Center provides complete audiometric evaluations performed by our licensed, certified audiologists. Evaluations include a number of specialized tests for infants, children and adults which assess hearing ability and type of hearing loss.  Complete Hearing Aid Services Hearing aids… Read more »

Care Management

Through Care Management, our patients receive the healthcare information they want and need when they are struggling with chronic illnesses, such as Diabetes, Asthma, heart and respiratory diseases. Too often, patients find themselves after discharge, wondering how to manage their medications, monitor their condition, and follow instructions received at the hospital.  Care Managers help patients… Read more »

Dental Services

Taking Care of Your Family’s Smile Good oral hygiene is essential to the well-being of your health, and our compassionate, knowledgable Dental staff can provide ways to help you practice healthier habits for a lifetime of healthy smiles. PCHC’s comprehensive Dental Services provides full dental care for your entire family – in two state-of-the-art facilities… Read more »

Dermatology

Dermatology Services are available in our Medical Specialists Department and are provided by William Gallagher, MD, Dermatologist. Dr. Gallagher treats all ages and skin diseases from acne to skin cancer, including: Adult and pediatric acne Eczema and psoriasis Hair disorders Inflammatory skin disorders Rashes and allergic reactions Rosacea and seborrheic dermatitis Screenings for skin cancer… Read more »

Family Medicine

At Penobscot Community Health Care, our Family Medicine physicians, physician assistants and nurse practitioners focus on prevention, treatment, and education of illness and injury. PCHC offers a full line of services to meet your specific needs.  We make it easy to get the care you need by having Mental Health, Lab Services, X-Ray, Pharmacy  and Physical… Read more »

Geriatrics

Caring for you through all of the stages of your life Penobscot Community Health Care’s Community Care & Geriatrics features ongoing, collaborative and integrated medical care for seniors and adults with unique needs. Our skilled team of providers focuses on solutions for patients, caregivers, and their families in nursing homes, long-term care facilities, and patient… Read more »

Health Care for the Homeless

Summer Street Health Center We provide integrated medical and mental health services to homeless and peri-homeless individuals at 34 Summer Street, Bangor. Summer Street Health Center hosts a number of support groups and participates in a number of community-oriented projects, inlcuding the Warm Tree where they collect fall and winter attire for homeless and peri-homeless persons. Outback Program… Read more »

Laboratory Services

At PCHC, we make lab testing easy for people with busy lives.  As a PCHC patient, you don’t need to go anywhere else – PCHC operates full service laboratory for your convenience. Lab tests can be drawn at almost all PCHC practices, in CLIA-certified lab facilities.  If your insurance participates with PCHC for lab services, testing can be… Read more »

Medical Specialists

Ensuring Access for All to Medical Specialists Integrated with Primary Care Services Often, you might have a health problem that requires you to see a medical specialist.  Because of this, PCHC  employs or partners with over 14 medical specialists to make sure your health care needs are met in a timely manner. The specialities provided… Read more »

Mental Health

At PCHC, we believe that the head is attached to the body – that your mental health plays a big role in your overall well-being – so we have integrated mental health professionals into every medical practice to offer you the most comprehensive care available. Integrated mental health is designed to provide you with immediate mental… Read more »

Nutrition

PCHC offers a range of nutrition services, including high-quality nutrition counseling and education, modified diets, and individual diet therapy for those with special nutritional needs. Our on-site Licensed, Registered Dietitian provides nutritional services to patients with diabetes, patients diagnosed as underweight, overweight and obese, patients with nutritional deficiencies and food allergies, and patients with cholesterol… Read more »

Optometry

Integrated Optometry Services are provided at Helen Hunt Health Center in Old Town by John Gaetani, OD, who has practiced in the area for over 10 years.  Dr. Gaetani will see patients of all PCHC practices. Optometry services range from basic vision screenings and diagnosis and treatment of disorders of the visual system, to the diagnosis of systemic… Read more »

Orthopedics

Orthopedic Services are provided by Phillip Kimball, MD, Orthopedic Physician. Dr. Kimball offers a full range of Orthopedic Services, including evaluation, consultation and treatment of joint related injuries at Brewer Medical Center, 735 Wilson Street, Brewer. This service is limited to PCHC patients only.

Osteopathic Manipulation Therapy

Osteopathic Manipulation Therapy is a hands-on method of therapy used by Doctors of Osteopathic Medicine to diagnose and treat illness or injury. Through OMT, Osteopathic providers employ pressure, stretching, and resistance techniques to manipulate muscle or joints. The general purpose of OMT is to ease pain, increase mobility, and promote healing.  OMT can provide great… Read more »

Pediatrics

From birth to adolescence, your child will receive high quality primary health care in a warm and welcoming environment.  At Penobscot Pediatrics, your child may be seen 7 days a week with same day acute care and 24 hour pediatrician coverage.  Pediatric care is also available at Helen Hunt Health Center and at all of our… Read more »

Pharmacy

Fill Your Prescription Before You Leave the Doctor’s Office PCHC has three full-service pharmacies conveniently located at Penobscot Community Health Center in Bangor, Helen Hunt Health Center in Old Town, and Brewer Medical Center in Brewer.  PCHC pharmacies are staffed by knowledgeable pharmacists, who strive to offer patients compassionate care and education regarding their prescriptions…. Read more »

Physical Therapy

The Science of Healing and the Art of Caring Quality Services PCHC offers a range of physical therapy services to meet your needs whether rehabilitation, conditioning, training, prevention, or reeducation. We strive to give you the attention you deserve in the treatment or your injury, condition, or therapy concern. Our goal is to assist you… Read more »

Podiatry

Foot pain and discomfort can be uncomfortable and disruptive to day-to-day life.  PCHC’s Podiatry practice is dedicated to providing relief from foot pain and helping patients regain mobility and comfort so that they can enjoy their daily activities. PCHC’s Podiatry Department is staffed by Dennis Claire, DPM and David Franklin, DPM.  Whether your discomfort is the… Read more »

Speech Therapy

Diagnosis and Treatment of Speech and Language Disorders The Warren Center offers professional diagnostic evaluations to clients of all ages for identification and treatment of communication disorders including: articulation disorders, such as the omission, substitution or distortion of speech sounds rendering speech difficult to understand, or affecting a person’s acceptance in society stuttering/dysfluency, the interruption… Read more »

Walk-In Care

Don’t Feel Well? Just come in. We’ll take care of you. Walk-in Care provides for immediate care needs without scheduling an appointment. Just walk-in at one of three convenient locations when you’re sick and see one of our providers. Minor injuries or illnesses that can be treated by one of our Walk-In Care departments include… Read more »

Women’s Health

Gynecological Care PCHC’s Women’s Health department provides sensitive, respectful, high-quality care to women of all ages.  Our Board Certified Gynecologist and Women’s Health Nurse Practitioner provide routine exams and minor gynecological procedures on-site in our Speciality practice. PCHC’s Women’s Health department assists women with complex gynecological problems, routine annual exams, pregnancy testing, family planning counseling,… Read more »

X-Ray

Radiology Services At PCHC, we make having x-rays taken easy for people with busy lives. As a PCHC patient, you don’t need to go anywhere else – PCHC operates two full service x-ray departments for your convenience. X-rays ordered by your PCHC provider can be taken at Helen Hunt Health Center in Old Town or… Read more »
